text: The 2017 Liga 3 Bangka Belitung season is the third edition of Liga 3 Bangka Belitung is a qualifying round of the 2017 Liga 3. PS Beltim are the defending champions. ==Teams== Liga 3 Bangka Belitung will be followed by six clubs namely PS Basel (South Bangka), PS Banteng (Central Bangka), Persibel Belitung, PS Beltim (East Belitung), PS Bangka Selection, and Belitong F.C.. ==League table== {| class="wikitable" |- !
